mapper.insert: insert into know.likeanswer (userId, answerId, likeTime) values (#{userId}, #{answerId}, #{likeTime});
mapper.delete: delete from know.likeanswer where userId = #{userId} and answerId = #{answerId}
mapper.insert: insert into know.likecomment (userId, commentId, likeTime) values (#{userId}, #{commentId}, #{likeTime});
mapper.delete: delete from know.likecomment where userId = #{userId} and commentId = #{commentId}
